clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the lamp base to ensure it is free of dust or other particles.

rotate_lever.description: Rotate the lever to control the light intensity or to switch the lamp on or off.

clean_lever.description: Clean the lever to ensure it remains functional and free of dust or other particles.

clean_head.description: Clean the head of the lamp to ensure the light is not obstructed by dust or other particles.

rotate_head.description: Rotate the head of the lamp to illuminate the area of your choice.

rotate_bar.description: Rotate the bar to reposition lamp to meet your lighting needs.

clean_bar.description: Clean the bar to ensure smooth rotation and to remove dust or other particles.

clean_whole_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the lamp base, lever, head, and rotation bar.

operate_lamp.description: Turn on the lamp by rotating the lever and adjusting the head and rotation bar for desired illumination.
